long.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,es,et,fa,fil,fr,gu,:
With the Official Lexend Font Chrome Extension, you can transform how you view websites and dive into the world of Lexend fonts.

ğŸ–‹ï¸ Features
Say goodbye to boring fonts and enjoy the versatility of Lexend! This extension makes it easy to change the font on any website to your favorite Lexend style. Choose from these fantastic fonts:

ğŸ”¤ Lexend Deca
ğŸ”¤ Lexend Exa
ğŸ”¤ Lexend Giga
ğŸ”¤ Lexend Mega
ğŸ”¤ Lexend Peta
ğŸ”¤ Lexend Tera
ğŸ”¤ Lexend Zetta


ğŸ¤ Built & Maintained by the Helperbird Team
The Lexend Font Chrome Extension is lovingly crafted and continuously maintained by the passionate team at Helperbird. We ensure a seamless and delightful user experience for everyone. Looking for more than just font magic? Check out Helperbird for all things accessibility, reading, and writing! Use code "lexend" at checkout for an exclusive 25% discount.

ğŸŒ Website
Curious about Lexend's intriguing history? Visit Lexend.com for a fascinating look into this exceptional font.

ğŸ”„ Updates

ğŸ†• Version 2024.6.6
Completely rebuilt using the side panel for a more intuitive experience.
Much lighter and quicker, improving performance.
Enhanced accessibility features for a better user experience.

ğŸ†• Version 3.0.0
Support for icons to add a personal touch.
Streamlined code for better performance.
Only essential permissions requested.

ğŸ”„ Version 2.0.1
Stunning new UI and layout for an enhanced browsing experience.
Upgraded to MV3 manifest, leveraging the latest Chrome features.
Efficient, clutter-free code.

Privacy-focused permissions review and adjustments.
For any questions or assistance, feel free to contact Robert at robert@lexend.com.

Unleash your creativity and explore the beauty of Lexend fonts with our official Chrome extension. Get ready for a captivating browsing experience.

Install now and elevate your web journey! ğŸš€
